userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Certificate of Residence for Elizabeth Temple, Westminster, Middlesex County (England), 1719 Jan 26, Manuscript # MS 2000.23, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Certification by the minister and churchwardens of St. James Parish, Westminster, Middlesex County, that Elizabeth Temple resides in the parish. Signed by Samuel Clarke, D.D., and the church wardens.
